name: Sendy Tool
natural_language_description: 这是 Sendy Tool 节点。主要用于: Consume Sendy API

descriptionType.name: descriptionType
descriptionType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Tool Description | 默认值: auto
available_options: Set Automatically (值: auto) - Automatically set based on resource and operation
Set Manually (值: manual) - Manually set the description

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.natural_language_description: 参数名: Description | 作用: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often | 默认值: Consume Sendy API | (必填项)

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: subscriber

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: add
available_options: Add (值: add) - Add a subscriber to a list
Delete (值: delete) - Delete a subscriber from a list
Remove (值: remove) - Unsubscribe user from a list
Status (值: status) - Get the status of subscriber

fromName.name: fromName
fromName.natural_language_description: 参数名: From Name | 作用: The 'From name' of your campaign

fromEmail.name: fromEmail
fromEmail.natural_language_description: 参数名: From Email | 作用: The 'From email' of your campaign

replyTo.name: replyTo
replyTo.natural_language_description: 参数名: Reply To | 作用: The 'Reply to' of your campaign

title.name: title
title.natural_language_description: 参数名: Title | 作用: The 'Title' of your campaign

subject.name: subject
subject.natural_language_description: 参数名: Subject | 作用: The 'Subject' of your campaign

htmlText.name: htmlText
htmlText.natural_language_description: 参数名: HTML Text | 作用: The 'HTML version' of your campaign

sendCampaign.name: sendCampaign
sendCampaign.description: Whether to send the campaign as well and not just create a draft. Default is false.
sendCampaign.natural_language_description: 参数名: Send Campaign | 作用: Whether to send the campaign as well and not just create a draft. Default is false. | 默认值: False

brandId.name: brandId
brandId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Brand ID | (必填项)

additionalFields.name: additionalFields
additionalFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: country (值: None) - User's 2 letter country code
gdpr (值: None) - Whether you're signing up EU users in a GDPR compliant manner

hp (值: None) - Include this 'honeypot' field to prevent spambots from signing up via this API call. When spambots fills in this field, this API call will exit, preventing them from signing up fake addresses to your form. This parameter is only supported in Sendy 3.0 onwards.
referrer (值: None) - The URL where the user signed up from
silent (值: None) - Set to "true" if your list is 'Double opt-in' but you want to bypass that and signup the user to the list as 'Single Opt-in instead' (optional)

email.name: email
email.natural_language_description: 参数名: Email | 作用: Email address of the subscriber

listId.name: listId
listId.description: The list ID you want to subscribe a user to. This encrypted & hashed ID can be found under View all lists section named ID.
listId.natural_language_description: 参数名: List ID | 作用: The list ID you want to subscribe a user to. This encrypted & hashed ID can be found under View all lists section named ID.
